channel.title: ICNTSE FEED
channel.description: International Conference on New Trends in Sustainable Energy - PUA - KTH

item.title: ICNTSE is now under the auspices of The Ministry of Electricity and Renewable Energy - Egypt
item.description: The Minister of Electricity and Renewable Energy, Dr. Mohamed Shaker El-Markabi, has accepted the invitation to attend the conference's opening ceremony and that the conference would be under the auspices of The Ministry of Electricity and Renewable Energy - Egypt.
